title: Digital Advertising Campaign for Tourism Promotion
decision_details: -  Approval of the Cabinet has been granted previously to implement a digital advertising campaign to  promote Sri Lanka as an attractive tourist destination among the tourists in the United Kingdom,Germany, France, India and China. Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. John Amaratunga, the Minister of Tourism Development and Christian Religious Affairs, to award the contracts for the implementation of the said digital advertising campaigns for India and China to Havas Media India Private Limited and to M/s Ionic Media  respectively as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee and the Procurement Appeal Board, was approved by the Cabinet.
